channel.title: CVE Feed for N Squared -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for N Squared -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-50851|2024-08-02T22:23:43.612Z -- n%20squared -- appointment%20booking%20calendar%20%E2%80%94%20simply%20schedule%20appointments%20booking%20plugin
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in N Squared Appointment Booking Calendar — Simply Schedule Appointments Booking Plugin.This issue affects Appointment Booking Calendar — Simply Schedule Appointments Booking Plugin: from n/a before 1.6.6.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-22311|2024-08-01T22:43:34.513Z -- n%20squared -- simply%20schedule%20appointments
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in N Squared Simply Schedule Appointments allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Simply Schedule Appointments: from n/a through 1.6.6.20.

item.title: CVE-2024-22311|2024-03-27T05:40:14.116Z -- n%20squared -- simply%20schedule%20appointments
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in N Squared Simply Schedule Appointments allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Simply Schedule Appointments: from n/a through 1.6.6.20.
